backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing an in-memory key-to-row store with CRUD-style query methods, enforcing unique text keys and exposing record retrieval, listing, and size queries.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable feature evidence report documenting reconciliation-related feature changes, affected frontend files, dependent components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated JSON-style map summarizing the purpose of each major frontend source file for reconciliation, UI, parsing, validation, export, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark theme variables, and base styles for the application using an OKLCH color system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app, sets metadata, and loads the Vite-powered main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing the main layout, header/footer, and tab-based navigation between upload/configuration and results views.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/configVa: Provides validation logic for reconciliation configuration, currently ensuring at least one compare column is selected.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/excelPar: Handles client-side Excel parsing using XLSX: reads sheet names, parses a specified sheet into normalized headers and row objects, and filters empty rows.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/exportXl: Exports reconciliation results to a downloadable Excel file with a summary section and detailed per-row comparison across sheets A, B, and C.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/fileVali: Validates uploaded Excel files by extension, checks for expected sheet names, and ensures required headers exist based on template specifications.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/invoiceV: Empty placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/mismatch: Defines logic to detect mismatched compare columns across three rows by normalizing values and flagging any differences.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/normaliz: Utility to normalize cell values by trimming strings and converting empty or undefined values to null.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/PreviewT: Reusable component that renders a scrollable preview table showing the first N rows of a parsed Excel sheet with headers and empty-cell indicators.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/Reconcil: Read-only configuration panel explaining row-wise reconciliation rules and displaying all common columns automatically compared across three sheets.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/reconcil: Implements the core reconciliation algorithm that compares rows across three parsed sheets, determines match/mismatch/missing status, and produces summary statistics.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/ResultsT: Results UI for displaying reconciliation summaries, filtering/searching row-wise comparison results, viewing row details, and exporting outcomes to XLSX.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/template: Defines template specifications for sheets A, B, and C, including expected sheet names, required GST invoice headers, and template metadata.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/types.ts: Type definitions for parsed sheets, reconciliation configuration, result rows, statuses, and overall reconciliation results.
frontend/src/features/reconcile/UploadTa: React UI for uploading and validating three Excel files (A/B/C), auto-deriving common compare columns, previewing parsed data, configuring reconciliation, and running local reconciliation or template downloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, recreating and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity persistence, and detailed login status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Initializes Tailwind CSS layers and defines a comprehensive light/dark OKLCH color theme via CSS variables, plus base styles for borders and body typography.
frontend/src/lib/baseUrl.ts: Utility to construct asset URLs that respect Viteâ€™s BASE_URL, safely normalizing paths for root or subpath deployments.
frontend/src/lib/generateTemplates.ts: Generates and downloads Excel (.xlsx) template files using SheetJS based on predefined template specs, including headers, sheet names, and filenames.
frontend/src/lib/xlsx.ts: Type-safe wrapper around the SheetJS XLSX library, including interfaces and a helper to lazily load the library from a CDN at runtime.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Frontend entry point that mounts the React app, wiring React Query and Internet Identity providers and importing global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, content scanning, extended theme tokens (colors, fonts, radius, animations), and UI plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata snapshot describing the ICP dapp, its current version, and a structured list of implemented features and recent reconciliation-related changes.
